room_title: Escape room "Battle for the Throne" by LI Escape Game in New York
room_description:
You must sneak into the castle, pass by the Kingsguard undetected, and discover the hidden chambers within the Red Keep. Hopefully, you donâ€™t get beheaded along the way.

You and your mates want to join the Northerners for the epic battle. It is rumored that your Queen had inherited a secret stash of Dragon Glass that she keeps locked away. You need to steal and deliver this sacred glass to the King in the North as a token of good faith and your loyalty. The Northerners need this special glass to win the war to save mankind. Further instructions will be delivered by the Raven upon your arrival.
